AppFooter.tagline: The Global Agricultural Supply Chain Platform.

marketplacePage.title: Global Marketplace
marketplacePage.description: Discover agricultural products, equipment, and services from around the world.
marketplacePage.noItemsHint: Try adjusting your search or filters.

create.title: Create a New Listing
create.description: Share a product or service with the DamDoh network.

form.namePlaceholder: e.g., Organic Hass Avocados, Tractor Rental Service
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide a detailed description of your product or service.
form.locationPlaceholder: e.g., Nairobi, Kenya or California, USA
form.sustainableDescription: This item or service utilizes or promotes sustainable practices.
form.skillsPlaceholder: List the key skills or qualifications for this service.

talentExchangePage.title: Talent Exchange
talentExchangePage.description: Find skilled professionals and services across the agricultural value chain.
talentExchangePage.searchPlaceholder: Search by skill, service, or professional...
talentExchangePage.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search filters or check back later for new listings.

hero.title: Cultivating Connections, Harvesting Success with {appName}
hero.subtitle: The global platform connecting every link in the agricultural supply chain. From farm to fork, we foster growth, transparency, and opportunity.

features.title: One Platform, Endless Possibilities
features.subtitle: DamDoh provides the tools you need to thrive in the modern agricultural landscape.

networking.title: Smart Networking
networking.description: Connect with farmers, buyers, suppliers, and experts using our AI-powered recommendation engine.

marketplace.title: Global Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell products, from fresh produce to heavy machinery, in a secure and trusted environment.

forums.title: Knowledge Sharing
forums.description: Join community forums to discuss best practices, solve challenges, and learn from your peers.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Offer your skills or find the right talent for your agricultural operations, from farm hands to agronomists.

forWho.title: A Hub for the Entire Ecosystem
forWho.description: DamDoh is designed to empower every stakeholder in the agricultural value chain, creating a more connected and efficient industry.

farmers.title: Farmers & Producers
farmers.description: Access new markets, get fair prices, and connect with suppliers and experts to improve your yield and sustainability.

buyers.title: Buyers & Processors
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable products directly from producers and cooperatives around the world.

experts.title: Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your expertise, find new clients, and contribute to a more knowledgeable and skilled agricultural community.

cta.title: Ready to Grow Your Business?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of agricultural professionals who are building a more sustainable and prosperous future with DamDoh.
